user_auth.tests package

Submodules

user_auth.tests.test_profile module

class user_auth.tests.test_profile.ProfileTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Test case for the Profile API endpoint. This class contains tests for the PATCH and GET methods of the Profile API.

setUp()

Set up the test client and authenticate the user. This method is called before each test method is executed.

classmethod setUpTestData()

Set up test data for the ProfileTests class. This method creates test users, sellers, consumers, and a token for authentication.

test_get_consumer_authorized()

Test getting the consumer profile with valid data.

test_get_consumer_unauthorized()

Test getting the consumer profile without authentication.

test_get_not_exist_profile()

Test getting a non-existent profile.

test_get_seller_authorized()

Test getting the seller profile with valid data.

test_get_seller_unauthorized()

Test getting the seller profile without authentication.

test_get_unauthorized()

Test getting the profile without authentication.

test_patch_exist_email()

Test patching the profile with an existing email.

test_patch_incorrect_email()

Test patching the profile with an incorrect email.

test_patch_not_exist_profile()

Test patching a non-existent profile.

test_patch_not_owner()

Test patching the profile as a different user.

test_patch_owner_consumer()

Test patching the consumer profile with valid data.

test_patch_owner_seller()

Test patching the seller profile with valid data.

test_patch_unauthorized()

Test patching the profile without authentication.

Bases: APITestCase

Load initial data for the TestCase.

Test registration with already existing email.
